description: Header file declaring the DobbyInterface class, which provides methods for managing containers via Dobby, an interface for container operations, including starting, stopping, pausing, resuming, and querying containers, as well as event handling.

classes.name: DobbyInterface
classes.description: Class providing an interface for container management operations through Dobby, including container lifecycle commands and event callbacks.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the DobbyInterface with the provided event handler.

methods.name: terminate
methods.description: Cleans up resources associated with DobbyInterface.

methods.name: listContainers
methods.description: Retrieves a list of containers.

methods.name: getContainerInfo
methods.description: Gets detailed information about a specific container.

methods.name: getContainerState
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a specific container.

methods.name: startContainer
methods.description: Starts a container with the specified parameters.

methods.name: startContainerFromDobbySpec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby specification.

methods.name: stopContainer
methods.description: Stops a container, optionally forcing shutdown.

methods.name: pauseContainer
methods.description: Pauses a running container.

methods.name: resumeContainer
methods.description: Resumes a paused container.

methods.name: hibernateContainer
methods.description: Hibernates a container with specific options.

methods.name: wakeupContainer
methods.description: Wakes up a hibernated container.

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container.

methods.name: annotate
methods.description: Adds an annotation key-value pair to a container.

methods.name: removeAnnotation
methods.description: Removes an annotation from a container.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts a source to a target inside a container.

methods.name: unmount
methods.description: Unmounts a target from a container.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container has started.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container has stopped.

methods.name: onContainerStateChanged
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container’s state changes.

methods.name: onVerityFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when verification fails for a container.

methods.name: GetContainerDescriptorFromId
methods.description: Retrieves the container descriptor given its ID.

methods.name: GetContainerIdFromDescriptor
methods.description: Retrieves the container ID given its descriptor.

ctags.name: mEventListenerId
ctags.pattern: /^            int mEventListenerId; \/\/ Dobby event listener ID$/
